meanings.sent1: The balloon expanded bulgingly as more air was blown into it.
meanings.sent2: The suitcase was packed so full that it bulged bulgingly at the seams.
meanings.sent3: The frog's eyes popped out bulgingly when it spotted a juicy fly.
meanings.sent4: The riverbanks swelled bulgingly after days of heavy rain.
meanings.sent5: The chef's pastry dough rose bulgingly in the oven, creating a perfect flaky crust.

meanings.sent1: The bulgingly full backpack weighed heavily on the hiker's shoulders.
meanings.sent2: The bulgingly cheeks of the chipmunk were a sign of its hoarded acorns.
meanings.sent3: The bulgingly clouds in the sky looked like giant cotton balls.
meanings.sent4: The bulgingly muscles of the weightlifter impressed everyone at the gym.
meanings.sent5: The bulgingly eyes of the surprised cat made it look comical and adorable.
